resources.string:
This app was created by junior developer Khusanov Ismoilbek while studying at GITA Academy. This app was given to me a homework assignment in Lesson 3. 

 Instruction
 The 15-puzzle is a sliding puzzle that consists of a frame of numbered square tiles in random order with one tile missing. The puzzle also exists in other sizes, particularly the smaller 8 - puzzle. If the size is 3x3 tiles, the puzzle is called the 8 - puzzle or 9 - puzzle and if 4x4 tiles, the puzzle is called the 15 - puzzle or 16 - puzzle named, respectively, for the number of spaces. The object of the puzzle is to place the tiles in order by making sliding moves that in order by making sliding moves that use the empty space.


contact: khusanov.ismoilbek@gmail.com
Are you sure want to quit?
